atg.servlet
Interface ParameterServlet

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamoServlet
public interface ParameterServlet

This is an interface implemented by Servlets that have parameters. The parameter dictionary gets pushed onto the parameter stack when this servlet is referenced with a <droplet> tag. You can set default parameter values for your droplet in this dictionary. These values will be overridden by any parameters specified in the droplet call.
